rules_text:
{2}{W}{W}, Tap another untapped white creature you control: Excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
{W}, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Put a 1/1 white Dwarf Warrior creature token with first strike onto the battlefield.
